divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS WALKING MY DOG IN THE COUNTRY SIDE WHEN A GREEN GLOWING SAUCER APPEAREDOUT OF NOWERE IN THE SKY, WITH FLASHING LIGHTS. THEN MY DOG STARTED BARKINGMADLY AND THE OTHER ANIMALS WERE DASHING ABOUT WILDLY. I QUICKLY LEAPED BEHIND ABUSH. I WAS AMAZED AS THE OBJECT SLOWLY MOVED FROM LEFT TO RIGHT. IT HOVERED FORA WHILE THEN SHOT OF AT AN UPWARD ANGLE AT A TREMENDOUS SPEED.
